name: Microwave Particle Rifle
customPrimary: Spawns flares at low rate when hitting target, interfere point defense with its %s hp.

name: Polarized Particle Rifle
customPrimary: Spawns dark particles at low rate when hitting target, cause %s energy area damage.

name: Inverted Particle Rifle
customPrimary: Spawns motes at low rate when hitting target, seek target and cause %s EMP damage.

name: Crystal Shard Flak
customPrimary: Upon shattering, generates an additional %s crystal shards with a damage of %s, with similar properties to the shot of the %s.

name: Crystal Culverin
customPrimary:
Creates an additional random %s and %s projectile when the projectile detonates.

An area of shattered crystals is also created at the point of detonation, causing all enemy units within the area to take constant kinetic damage, which scales to their movement speed.
customPrimaryHL: Crystal Shard Autocannon | Crystal Shard Flak

name: Polar MIRV Launcher
customPrimary: When hitting hull or armour, there is a %s chance of generating an arc that strikes ship weapons and engine, dealing additional damage equal to the original hit.
customAncillary: All projectiles will generate %s energized magnetic streams each. Each excited projectile will also generate %s smaller magnetic stream, each dealing %s damage.

customPrimary: When hitting hull or armour, there is a %s chance of generating an arc that strikes ship weapons and engine, dealing additional damage equal to the original hit.
customAncillary: All projectiles will generate %s energized magnetic streams each. Each excited projectile will also generate %s smaller magnetic stream, each dealing %s damage.
